imdb.title: The Silver Guardian
imdb.plot: High school students and pro-level gamers Riku Suigin and Riku Rei are about to get swept up in an RPG unlike any other they've played before.

episodes.title: The Three from the Training Institute/Rin's True Identity
episodes.plot: In order to gain more allies, Suigin tries out Grave Buster's beginner's course. There, he encounters his classmate Shaa and the world champion of the virtual fighting game tournament, Titan.

episodes.title: Titan Goes Berserk/A Bewildered Suigin
episodes.plot: In order to get Farin to join his team, Suigin faces off with Titan. Meanwhile, the strongest organization in the game led by Dark Tiger, Precious, starts making moves to conquer Stage 0, not realizing there was now a brand new guardian.

episodes.title: First Ally/The Conquest Begins
episodes.plot: After being forced to log out of the game, Sugin gets a phone call from Temujin. He tells Suigin that if he wants to save Riku Rei, he has to go to Stage 0 and find a player named Nishikaze. He tells Farin this and they both set out to save Riku Rei.

episodes.title: Aslan's Trial/The Final Countdown
episodes.plot: Nishikaze shows up in front of Suigin and gives him a message from Temujin. The boss of Stage 0, Aslan, finally shows up and steals all of the players' blood, but it also appears that he's searching for someone.

episodes.title: The Door to Zero/A Reunion Through the Mirror
episodes.plot: Suigin wins the battle against Aslan and they all head to Stage 0's entrance. It's there that Suigin discovers the truth about his past as well as Riku Rei's.

episodes.title: The Crazy Randengyoku/Billion Player
episodes.plot: Now that Suigin regained his lost memories, he tries to go to the Totems' base with Nishikaze. However, a new foe stands in their way.

episodes.title: Suigin Meets Riku Rei
episodes.plot: The children of the wealthy go to Shinryou Private Academy. One day, the most beautiful and popular girl at school, Riku Rei, encounters the protagonist of this story, Suigin, who is a poor boy with no family.

episodes.title: Suigin Gets Closer to Riku Rei
episodes.plot: The poor student, Suigin, spends most of his days working various part-time jobs, and his only skill is gaming. Suigin meets Riku Rei through an online game. However, since Suigin is playing the game for free, their correspondence is limited.

episodes.title: Suigin Regrets the End
episodes.plot: Suigin finds out that his only way of interacting with Riku Rei is about to end. Suigin ends up in utter shock. However, in the game, Suigin promises Riku Rei to do everything he can to find the flower she is looking for in the game before it ends.

episodes.title: Suigin Recieves a Loss
episodes.plot: On the last day of services for "Dungeon Century," many of the players gathered to enjoy some last-minute festivities. Riku Rei waits for Suigin to arrive, but ends up going to find the flower herself because he's taking so long.

episodes.title: Suigin Inherits a Legacy
episodes.plot: Riku Rei summons Suigin after her father, Riku Yuuki dies, and hands him something that Yuuki apparently left for him. Suigin hesitantly accepts the item: a specialized console to play the new game "Grave Buster."

episodes.title: Suigin Pledges Himself to Riku Rei
episodes.plot: Riku Rei is taken by some debt collectors, and Suigin follows them. However, Riku Rei's captors immediately get away by car. Suigin somehow manages to catch up on a bike, but she is then taken away by a mysterious man who magically disappears.

episodes.title: Suigin's Chance Encouter with his Grandfather
episodes.plot: Suigin is pulled into the world of "Grave Buster" by a woman named Twin Star. Surprisingly, Suigin ends up meeting his grandfather, Riku Yuuki, who should've been dead, and he can't hide his doubts about this whole situation.

episodes.title: Suigin Becomes the Last Tomb Guardian
episodes.plot: Riku Yuuki explains the game of Grave Buster to Suigin. In the game of tomb raiding and tomb guarding that has gone on for years, Riku Yuuki ended up being the one and final guardian to guard the Goddess's tomb.

episodes.title: Suigin Learns to Play the Grave Robbing Game
episodes.plot: Suigin receives a message from Temujin, the man who kidnapped Riku Rei, who tells him to come to Grave Buster. Suigin must come up with a plan to save Riku Rei as soon as possible!

episodes.title: Suigin Stands Once Again
episodes.plot: Temujin sees something special in Riku Rei, and gets her something special while he's holding her captive.

episodes.title: Suigin Meets Takeshi
episodes.plot: Riku Rei undergoes a certain ritual and joins Temujin's group. Meanwhile, Suigin encounters a young boy named Takeshi, who ends up crashing a martial arts tournament and accidentally drags Suigin and Twin Star with him.

episodes.title: Suigin's New Journey
episodes.plot: Suigin takes Takeshi's place and fights in the tournament. However, he faces a penalty and ends up having a difficult battle against his enemy. And then the Twin Star reveals their true form and powers!
